data.title: Dixie Without Tad Online Quiz
data.meta_description: While Dixie is best remembered for her wonderful romance with Tad, shes had numerous other relationships, too. Test your knowledge on some of them right now! Good luck! All air dates are American.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. The first man who Dixie fell in love with was Adam Chandler. What do she and Adam have in common?

Answer: They came from the same town

Dixie came to town from Pigeon Hollow, West Virginia and it so happened that Adam Chandler grew up there, too. Adam needed someone to watch out for his stepdaughter so he hired Dixie to be a nanny. Despite how Dixie was the niece of his enemy, Palmer Cortlandt, Adam still was okay with wooing her.

2. Adam impregnated Dixie and she gave birth to their son, JR. Adam had a plan to take JR away from Dixie and raise him with which person?

Answer: Brooke English

Adam desperately wanted a male heir to the Chandler fortune but his wife at the time, Brooke, was unable to bear any children. As a result, Adam and Dixie made love, resulting in her being pregnant with JR. After she gave birth to him, Adam schemed to take him from Dixie and raise his child with Brooke. However, his plan failed since Dixie gained custody of JR and Brooke divorced Adam.

3. Dixie became romantically involved with Craig Lawson. Prior to arriving in town, Craig lived in what state?

Answer: California

Dixie was distraught after Tad was presumed dead upon falling off a bridge which exploded. She met a new man in town named Craig Lawson, who had just come from California. Craig falsely claimed that he knew Tad years ago when Tad was also in California.

4. Which woman was the primary reason behind Craig and Dixie divorcing?

Answer: Gloria Marsh

Gloria came to town shortly after Craig and knew of the lie told about knowing Tad. She blackmailed him into resuming their affair, which Craig agreed to do so she would keep his secret. Dixie eventually found out about Craig and Gloria's affair so she divorced Craig.

5. From late 1992 until mid 1993, Dixie was in a relationship with Brian Bodine. Brian fell for Dixie after breaking up with whom?

Answer: Hayley Vaughn

Dixie took a while before jumping into another relationship again but she eventually became smitten with Brian Bodine. This relationship resulted right after Brian had broken up with his high school sweetheart, Hayley Vaughn. During his relationship with Dixie, Brian formed a tight bond with JR.

6. Brian and Dixie ended up being married.

Answer: True

Tad regained his memory but insisted that he marry Brooke since they shared a child together, Jamie. Due to this, Dixie remained committed to Brian and the two eventually got married as well. However, their marriage did not last long and Brian left town shortly after their divorce.

7. Dixie first met her next suitor, Ted Orsini, in Napa.

Answer: False

Between the time Dixie broke up with Brian and reunited with Tad, she was involved with Ted Orsini. Ted was a splitting image of Tad and this endeared Dixie to him. However, Dixie became concerned after it was clear that Ted was obsessed with her.

8. Where did Dixie officially break up with Ted?

Answer: Canada

Ted lured Tad to the Canadian wilderness in order to kill him up there since he wanted Dixie all to himself. Dixie learned of his plan and raced to Canada to save Tad, which she ended up doing. While up in Canada, Dixie told Ted they could not be together anymore and they finally broke up in a lodge somewhere in the Canadian wilderness.

9. Dixie had a big relationship with David Hayward. They first met at which location?

Answer: Pine Valley Hospital

Dixie needed to get another job in order to help pay for expenses so she heard of an opportunity to be an administrative assistant at Pine Valley Hospital. David and Alexandra needed an administrative assistant for their new venture, The Andrassy Foundation. They hired Dixie and this was where David and Dixie first developed an attraction to one another.

10. David got involved with Dixie after breaking off an engagement with which woman?

Answer: Erica Kane

David was in a long relationship with Erica that resulted in an engagement. However, numerous arguments led them to break things off for good in the summer of 2000. It was about a month and a half after the broken engagement that things got steamy between David and Dixie.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
